get.description: Lists the dimensions by billingAccount Id.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter dimensions by properties/category, properties/usageStart, properties/usageEnd. Supported operators are 'eq','lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge'.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the properties/data within a dimension dategory. By default, data is not included when listing dimensions.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N dimension data.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all alerts for a subscription.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter alerts by properties/definition/type, properties/definition/category, properties/definition/criteria, properties/costEntityId, properties/creationTime, properties/closeTime, properties/status, properties/source. Supported operators are 'eq','lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge'.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N alerts.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all alerts for a resource group under a subscription.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter alerts by properties/definition/type, properties/definition/category, properties/definition/criteria, properties/costEntityId, properties/creationTime, properties/closeTime, properties/status, properties/source. Supported operators are 'eq','lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge'.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N alerts.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

target.description: Indicates which property in the request is responsible for the error.
Indicates which property in the request is responsible for the error.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

ReportListResult.description: Result of listing reports. It contains a list of available reports in the scope provided.

schedule.description: Has schedule information for the report.

CommonReportProperties.description: The common properties of the report.

format.description: The format of the report being delivered.

deliveryInfo.description: Has delivery information for the report.

ReportSchedule.description: The schedule associated with a report.

status.description: The status of the schedule. Whether active or not. If inactive, the report's scheduled execution is paused.

recurrencePeriod.description: Has start and end date of the recurrence. The start date must be in future. If present, the end date must be greater than start date.

ReportDeliveryInfo.description: The delivery information associated with a report.

destination.description: Has destination for the report being delivered.

timeframe.description: The time frame for pulling data for the report. If custom, then a specific time period must be provided.

timePeriod.description: Has time period for pulling data for the report.

dataset.description: Has definition for data in this report.

ReportRecurrencePeriod.description: The start and end date for recurrence schedule.

ReportDeliveryDestination.description: The destination information for the delivery of the report.

resourceId.description: The resource id of the storage account where reports will be delivered.

container.description: The name of the container where reports will be uploaded.

rootFolderPath.description: The name of the directory where reports will be uploaded.

ReportTimePeriod.description: The start and end date for pulling data for the report.

from.description: The start date to pull data from.

to.description: The end date to pull data to.

ReportDataset.description: The definition of data present in the report.

granularity.description: The granularity of rows in the report.

configuration.description: Has configuration information for the data in the report. The configuration will be ignored if aggregation and grouping are provided.

aggregation.description: Dictionary of aggregation expression to use in the report. The key of each item in the dictionary is the alias for the aggregated column. Report can have upto 2 aggregation clauses.

grouping.description: Array of group by expression to use in the report. Report can have upto 2 group by clauses.

filter.description: Has filter expression to use in the report.

ReportDatasetConfiguration.description: The configuration of dataset in the report.

columns.description: Array of column names to be included in the report. Any valid report column name is allowed. If not provided, then report includes all columns.

ReportAggregation.description: The aggregation expression to be used in the report.

name.description: The name of the column to aggregate.

function.description: The name of the aggregation function to use.

ReportGrouping.description: The group by expression to be used in the report.

type.description: Has type of the column to group.

name.description: The name of the column to group.

ReportFilter.description: The filter expression to be used in the report.

and.description: The logical "AND" expression. Must have atleast 2 items.

or.description: The logical "OR" expression. Must have atleast 2 items.

dimension.description: Has comparison expression for a dimension

tag.description: Has comparison expression for a tag

ReportColumnType.description: The type of the column in the report.

ReportComparisonExpression.description: The comparison expression to be used in the report.

name.description: The name of the column to use in comaprison.

operator.description: The operator to use for comparison.

values.description: Array of values to use for comparison

ReportExecutionListResult.description: Result of listing reports execution history of a report by name

ReportExecutionProperties.description: The properties of the report execution.

executionType.description: The type of the report execution.

status.description: The status of the report execution.

submittedBy.description: The identifier for the entity that executed the report. For OnDemand executions, it is the email id. For Scheduled executions, it is the constant value - System.

submittedTime.description: The time when report was queued to be executed.

processingStartTime.description: The time when report was picked up to be executed.

processingEndTime.description: The time when report execution finished.

fileName.description: The name of the file report got written to.

DimensionsListResult.description: Result of listing dimensions. It contains a list of available dimensions.

QueryResult.description: Result of query. It contains all columns listed under groupings and aggregation.

ConnectorDefinitionListResult.description: Result of listing connector definitions. It contains a list of available connector definitions in the scope provided.

reportId.description: Identifying source report. (For AWS this is a CUR report name, defined with Daily and with Resources)

lastRun.description: Last time the data acquisition process completed (even if no new data was found)

sourceLastUpdated.description: Source timestamp of external data currently available in Azure (eg AWS last processed CUR file timestamp)

lastUpdated.description: Last time the external data was updated into Azure

ConnectorCollectionErrorInfo.description: Details of any error encountered on last collection attempt

errorStartTime.description: Time the error started occuring (Last time error occurred in lastRun)

AlertListResult.description: Result of listing alerts. It contains a list of available alerts in the scope provided.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of Alerts.

costEntityId.description: The id of the creating cost-entity (budget, invoice, credit).

details.description: Specific details of an alert - key-value dictionary.

creationTime.description: The time when the alert was created.

closeTime.description: The time when the alert was closed (resolved / overriden).

status.description: The current status of the alert.

type.description: The type of cost-entity the alert is defined on.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2018-08-01-preview.
